question: Which of the following economists was associated with the WTO draft document?
explanation:
J.N. Bhagawati is the economist who is associated with the drafting of the WTO.
He is an American economist who had an immense role to play in the reshaping of the world economy.
He did multiple researches on free trade and in establishing an economy for his advocacy of international trade. He did a lot of progress regarding political economy and he also won the lifetime achievement award from the National chamber of commerce.
